name: An Ordinary Day (DevX)
description:
A game made by the DevX Society of Tagore International School, East of Kailash

Welcome to our game ‘An Ordinary Day’. In this game, you will play the role of a teenager, who is going about his day-to-day activities during the Covid 19 pandemic situation. As you navigate through the day, you will need to make choices. A correct choice would help you to earn health points and will permit you to progress through the storyline. So go ahead, follow the protocols, stay safe and stay healthy!

Created by Aryan Nagpal, Aarush Agarwal and Angad Singh.

Taken help from the free assets of these creators:

Rexal

Masked

Galv's plugins

William Ramsey ( TheUnproPro)

and Kino
